languages.text: "Вновь ссоритесь, господа? Как предсказуемо". {n}Женщина в тяжелой броне входит на мостик с таким видом, будто она здесь главная. Вам доводилось видеть ее прежде — она была в свите Ксавьера Калькасара, нагрянувшего в ваши покои после Магнэ Ацессио.{/n} "Благодарю, что не стали начинать без меня. Аколит Айшара, откомандирована Лорд-инквизитором для осуществления специальных действий на Ефрате-II. В рамках военного совета мне дарована привилегия совещательного голоса".

"Are you having another fight, gentlemen? How predictable." {n}A woman in heavy armour walks onto the bridge cloaked in an air of superiority. You remember seeing her before — in the retinue of Xavier Calcazar when he barged into your chambers after your Magnae Accessio.{/n} "Thank you for not starting without me. Acolyte Aishara, dispatched by the Lord Inquisitor to facilitate the operation on Eufrates II. My role on this war council is that of an advisor."
languages.original_text: "Вновь ссоритесь, господа? Как предсказуемо". {n}Женщина в тяжелой броне входит на мостик с таким видом, будто она здесь главная. Вам доводилось видеть ее прежде — она была в свите Ксавьера Калькасара, нагрянувшего в ваши покои после Магнэ Ацессио.{/n} "Благодарю, что не стали начинать без меня. Аколит Айшара, откомандирована Лорд-инквизитором для осуществления специальных действий на Ефрате-II. В рамках военного совета мне дарована привилегия совещательного голоса".

You remember seeing her before — in the retinue of Xavier Calcazar when he barged into your chambers after your Magnae Accessio.{/n} "Thank you for not starting without me. Acolyte Aishara, dispatched by the Lord Inquisitor to facilitate the operation on Eufrates II. My privileges on this war council are those of an advisor."
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "Are you having another fight, gentlemen? How predictable." {n}A woman in heavy armour walks onto the bridge cloaked in an air of superiority. You remember seeing her before — in the retinue of Xavier Calcazar when he barged into your chambers after your Magnae Accessio.{/n} "Thank you for not starting without me. Acolyte Aishara, dispatched by the Lord Inquisitor to facilitate the operation on Eufrates II. My role on this war council is that of an advisor."

languages.text: “你们这是又要吵起来了吗，各位绅士？真是不出所料。”{n}一位身着重型装甲的女性走到了舰桥，散发着高高在上的气场。你记得你见过这个女人。继任颂典期间，希维尔·卡尔卡扎闯进了你的房间，而这个女人就是他当时的其中一位随从。{/n}“感谢各位没在我不在场的情况下擅自举行会议。我是艾莎拉侍仆，受大审判官大人派遣来此，协助欧夫拉茨二号星的军事行动。我负责担任战争议会的顾问。”
languages.original_text: "Are you having another fight, gentlemen? How predictable." {n}A woman in heavy armour walks onto the bridge cloaked in an air of superiority. You remember seeing her before — in the retinue of Xavier Calcazar when he barged into your chambers after your Magnae Accessio.{/n} "Thank you for not starting without me. Acolyte Aishara, dispatched by the Lord Inquisitor to facilitate the operation on Eufrates II. My role on this war council is that of an advisor."

traits.locale_text: “你们这是又要吵起来了吗，各位绅士？真是不出所料。”{n}一位身着动力甲的女性走到了舰桥，周身散发着高高在上的气场。你记得你见过这个个女人。继任颂典期间，希维尔·卡尔卡扎闯进了你的房间，而这个女人就是他当时的其中一位随从。{/n}“谢谢你们没在我不在场的情况下擅自举行会议。我是艾莎拉侍仆，受审判长大人派遣来此，协助欧夫拉茨二号星的军事行动。我负责担任战争议会的顾问。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Vous êtes encore en train de vous disputer, messieurs ? Vous êtes si prévisible. » {n}Une femme en armure lourde s'avance sur la passerelle avec un air supérieur. Vous vous rappelez l'avoir déjà vue dans l'entourage de Xavier Calcazar, lorsque celui-ci a fait irruption dans vos appartements après votre Magnae Accessio.{/n} « Merci de m'avoir attendue pour commencer. Acolyte Aishara, envoyée par le seigneur inquisiteur pour faciliter l'opération sur Euphrate-II. Je serai une consultante dans ce conseil de guerre. »
languages.original_text: "Are you having another fight, gentlemen? How predictable." {n}A woman in heavy armour walks onto the bridge cloaked in an air of superiority. You remember seeing her before — in the retinue of Xavier Calcazar when he barged into your chambers after your Magnae Accessio.{/n} "Thank you for not starting without me. Acolyte Aishara, dispatched by the Lord Inquisitor to facilitate the operation on Eufrates II. My role on this war council is that of an advisor."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes encore en train de vous disputer, messieurs ? Vous êtes toujours aussi prévisibles. » {n}Une femme en armure énergétique s'avance sur la passerelle avec un air particulièrement supérieur. Vous vous rappelez l'avoir déjà vue dans l'entourage de Xavier Calcazar, lorsque celui-ci a fait irruption dans vos appartements après votre Magnae Accessio.{/n} « Merci de m'avoir attendue pour commencer. Acolyte Aishara, envoyée par le seigneur inquisiteur pour faciliter l'opération sur Euphrate-II. J'ai les privilèges d'une conseillère dans ce conseil de guerre. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「またケンカかしら？しょうがない人たちね」{n}パワーアーマーに身を包んだ女性が優越感に満ちた雰囲気でブリッジに入ってきた。彼女に見覚えがある…ザビエル・カルカサルがマグナ・アクセシオの後、こちらの執務室に押し入ってきたときに見かけた。{/n}「私なしで始めないでくれてありがとう。私はアコライト・アイシャラ、ユーフラテス・IIでの作戦を促進するためにロード・インクィジターの命で派遣されたわ。この軍事会議において私は顧問の役割を果します」
languages.original_text: "Are you having another fight, gentlemen? How predictable." {n}A woman in heavy armour walks onto the bridge cloaked in an air of superiority. You remember seeing her before — in the retinue of Xavier Calcazar when he barged into your chambers after your Magnae Accessio.{/n} "Thank you for not starting without me. Acolyte Aishara, dispatched by the Lord Inquisitor to facilitate the operation on Eufrates II. My role on this war council is that of an advisor."

traits.locale_text: 「またケンカかしら？しょうがない人たちね」{n}パワーアーマーに身を包んだ女性が優越感に満ちた雰囲気でブリッジに入ってきた。彼女に見覚えがある…ザビエル・カルカサルがマグナ・アクセシオの後、こちらの執務室に押し入ってきたときに見かけた。{/n}「私なしで始めないでくれてありがとう。私はアコライト・アイシャラ、ユーフラテス・IIでの作戦を促進するためにロード・インクィジターの命で派遣されたわ。この軍事会議において私は顧問の役割を果します」
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: «¿Otra vez con sus riñas, caballeros? Qué predecibles». {n}Una mujer ataviada con una armadura pesada entra en el puente con aires de superioridad. Recuerdas haberla visto antes: en el séquito de Xavier Calcazar cuando irrumpió en tus aposentos tras tu Magnae Accessio.{/n} «Les agradezco que no hayan empezado sin mí. Soy la acólita Aishara; me envía el Lord Inquisidor para facilitar la operación en Eufrates II. Ejerceré de asesora en este consejo de guerra».
languages.original_text: "Are you having another fight, gentlemen? How predictable." {n}A woman in heavy armour walks onto the bridge cloaked in an air of superiority. You remember seeing her before — in the retinue of Xavier Calcazar when he barged into your chambers after your Magnae Accessio.{/n} "Thank you for not starting without me. Acolyte Aishara, dispatched by the Lord Inquisitor to facilitate the operation on Eufrates II. My role on this war council is that of an advisor."

traits.locale_text: «¿Otra vez con sus riñas, caballeros? Qué predecibles». {n}Una mujer ataviada con una armadura de gran envergadura entra en el puente con aires de superioridad. Recuerdas haberla visto antes: en el séquito de Xavier Calcazar cuando irrumpió en tus aposentos tras tu Magnae Accessio.{/n} «Les agradezco que no hayan empezado sin mí. Soy la acólita Aishara; me envía el Lord Inquisidor para facilitar la operación en Eufrates II. Ejerceré de consejera en esta ocasión».
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Streiten die Herren sich wieder? Wie vorhersehbar." {n}Eine Frau in Servorüstung betritt die Brücke. Sie strahlt Überlegenheit aus. Du erinnerst dich, sie schon einmal gesehen zu haben. Im Gefolge von Xavier Calcazar, als er nach deiner Magnae Accessio in deine Gemächer geplatzt ist.{/n} "Danke, dass Ihr nicht ohne mich begonnen habt. Akolythin Aishara, vom Großinquisitor entsandt, um die Operation auf Eufrates II voranzubringen. Meine Rolle in diesem Kriegsrat ist die einer Beraterin."
languages.original_text: "Are you having another fight, gentlemen? How predictable." {n}A woman in heavy armour walks onto the bridge cloaked in an air of superiority. You remember seeing her before — in the retinue of Xavier Calcazar when he barged into your chambers after your Magnae Accessio.{/n} "Thank you for not starting without me. Acolyte Aishara, dispatched by the Lord Inquisitor to facilitate the operation on Eufrates II. My role on this war council is that of an advisor."

traits.locale_text: "Streiten die Herren sich wieder? Wie vorhersehbar." {n}Eine Frau in Energierüstung betritt die Brücke. Sie strahlt Überlegenheit aus. Du erinnerst dich, sie schon einmal gesehen zu haben. Im Gefolge von Xavier Calcazar, als er nach deiner Magnae Accessio in deine Gemächer geplatzt ist.{/n} "Danke, dass Ihr nicht ohne mich begonnen habt. Akolythin Aishara, vom Großinquisitor entsandt, um die Operation auf Eufrates II voranzubringen. Meine Privilegien in diesem Kriegsrat sind die einer Beraterin."
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Yine mi kavga ediyorsunuz beyler? Hiç şaşırmıyorum." {n}Güç zırhı kuşanmış bir kadın, üstünlük taslayan bir edayla köprüye yürüyor. Gözün onu bir yerden ısırıyor. Magnae Accessio'nun ardından odana dalan Xavier Calcazar'ın maiyetinde bulunduğunu hatırlıyorsun.{/n} "Bensiz başlamadığınız için teşekkürler. Ben havari Aishara, Lord Engizisyoncu tarafından Eufrates II'deki operasyona destek çıkmakla görevlendirildim. Bu savaş konseyindeki vazifem ise danışmanlık."
languages.original_text: "Are you having another fight, gentlemen? How predictable." {n}A woman in heavy armour walks onto the bridge cloaked in an air of superiority. You remember seeing her before — in the retinue of Xavier Calcazar when he barged into your chambers after your Magnae Accessio.{/n} "Thank you for not starting without me. Acolyte Aishara, dispatched by the Lord Inquisitor to facilitate the operation on Eufrates II. My role on this war council is that of an advisor."
